==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|gültic}}, from {{m|gmh|gülte}}, from {{m|gmh|gelten}}. Cognate with {{cog|nds|güllig}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɡʏltɪç/}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|-}} # [[valid]], [[validated]], [[legal]] # [[available]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj-notcomp|gültig}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|ungültig}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
